title: Huazhong University demonstrates LK-99 diamagnetism
dot:
digraph G{rankdir=TB;node[shape=box, style=rounded, fontname="Arial", fontsize=10];edge[fontname="Arial", fontsize=8];Post[label="Post", shape=ellipse, style=filled, fillcolor=lightblue];Conversation[label="Conversation", shape=ellipse, style=filled, fillcolor=lightblue];Post->Claim[label="First claimed successful replication"];Claim[label="Claim: Successful replication of LK-99
by Huazhong University of Science and Technology"];Claim->Evidence[label="Why this is evidence"];Evidence[label="LK-99 flake levitates for both
orientations of the magnetic field"];Evidence->Diamagnetism[label="Implies"];Diamagnetism[label="Diamagnetism (property of superconductors)"];Diamagnetism->Caveats[label="But"];Caveats[label="Caveats:
